valfaris is an excellent metroidvania that strikes an even line between the two games  really enjoy the heavy metal soundtrack that offsets the science fiction setting and pairs closer to the body horror elements of the game  my only complaint is that this game is much easier to play with a controller than a keyboard and mouse but that was likely a stylistic choice of the devs  id be interested to see what they produce in the future
